mapper.insert: insert into notice_tb (title, category, content, created_time) values(#{title}, #{category}, #{content}, now())
insert into notice_file_tb (notice_id, origin_filename, uuid_filename) values(#{noticeId}, #{originFilename}, #{uuidFilename})
mapper.select: select id from notice_tb where title = #{title} and content = #{content} order by id limit 1
select * from notice_tb order by id DESC
SELECT n.*, f.uuid_filename, f.origin_filename FROM notice_tb AS n LEFT JOIN notice_file_tb AS f ON n.id = f.notice_id WHERE n.id = #{id}
